Articles.Content:
Hi,

it would be nice to add a new rotation mode for the 3D mouse.

The current mode "moves" the camera, the rotation center is the camera itself.

The new mode should have the rotation center in screen center or at the selected part, to move the camera around this center.

This is how most 3D applications I work with handle the 3D mouse view.

How it is currently in KSP confuses me to hell

Thanks!
